status.description: Post status: publish (default), pending, draft, future, private, trash

sticky.description: Sticky posts: true (stick to top), false (exclude them), only (exclude normal posts) - By default, they are treated the same as normal posts

parent.description: Include by parent ID or name

exclude_parent.description: Exclude by parent ID or name

author.description: Include by author ID, login name, or 'current'

exclude_author.description: Exclude by author ID, login name, or 'current'

category.description: Include by category ID, slug, or 'current'

exclude_category.description: Exclude by category ID, slug, or 'current'

tag.description: Include by tag ID, slug, or 'current'

exclude_tag.description: Exclude by tag ID, slug, or 'current'

taxonomy.description: Include by taxonomy ID, slug, or 'current' for taxonomy archive.Use with 'term' and 'taxonomy_compare' attributes

terms.description: Include by taxonomy term ID, slug, or 'current'.Use with 'taxonomy' attribute

child_terms.description: Set 'true' to include child terms for hierarchical taxonomies

taxonomy_compare.description: One of 'in' (default), 'not', 'and', 'exists', and 'not exists'.Use with 'taxonomy' attribute

taxonomy_relation.description: When using more than one 'taxonomy' queries, can specify 'and' or 'or'

search.description: Search by given keyword - Prepending a keyword with a hyphen '-' will exclude posts matching it

publish_date.description: Filter by publish date in Y-M-D format, 'today', 'X days ago' and other values compatible with strtotime() - Optionally use 'publish_compare' attribute

publish_year.description: Filter by given publish year, or 'current'

publish_month.description: Filter by given publish month, from 1 to 12, or 'current'

publish_week.description: Filter by given publish week, from 1 to 54, or 'current' - Note: the 'publish_compare' attribute is not supported for this field

publish_day.description: Filter by given publish day of the month, from 1 to 31, or 'current'

custom_field.description: Filter by given custom field - Faster than using 'field', this queries raw field values in the database

custom_field_value.description: Filter by given custom field value

custom_field_type.description: For custom field query, one of: string (default), number, date, time, datetime

custom_date_field.description: Filter by given custom date field - Faster than using 'field', this queries raw field values in the database

custom_date_field_value.description: Filter by given custom date field value, or 'current'

custom_date_field_format.description: For custom date field query, specify the date format of the field value - Default is 'Ymd'; For date-time field, set 'Y-m-d H:i:s'. If it's a timestamp, use 'timestamp'. For custom field plugins other than ACF, you may need to use a different format.

custom_date_field_type.description: For custom date field query, one of: date (default), time, datetime, number

orderby.description: Order by one of: id, author, title, name, type, date, modified, random, comment_count, relevance, menu

orderby_field_number.description: Order by custom field whose value is a number

product_categories.description: Get product categories this coupon can apply to. Returns a Loop

excluded_product_categories.description: Get product categories this coupon cannot not apply to. Returns a Loop

products.description: Get product IDs this coupon can apply to. Returns a Loop

excluded_products.description: Get product IDs that this coupon should not apply to. Returns a Loop

used_by.description: Get records of all users who have used the current coupon. Returns a Loop

usage_limit_per_user.description: Get coupon usage limit per customer (for a single customer)

limit_usage_to_x_items.description: Usage limited to certain amount of items

free_shipping.description: If this coupon grants free shipping or not

exclude_sale_items.description: If this coupon should exclude items on sale

email_restrictions.description: Get emails to check customer usage restrictions

virtual.description: If the filter is added through the woocommerce_get_shop_coupon_data filter, it's virtual and not in the DB

is_valid.description: Check if a coupon is valid for the cart
